jdbcService.sql: update tag set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), name = case when :name is null then name else :name end, parent_id = case when :parentId is null then parent_id else :parentId end, verified = case when :verified is null then verified else :verified end, tag_group_id = case when :tagGroupId is null then tag_group_id else :tagGroupId end where id = :id
